channel.title: How do i change my home?
channel.description: how do i change the home?

item.title: How do i change my home?
item.dc:creator: @Leecher_Ian Leecher Ian
item.description:
@Leecher_Ian wrote:

Don’t liten at those ppl their retards,your new it’s ok

First you’ll open

player.java

look for
teleportToX =
with ctrl+f

You’ll Simply modify too

    teleportToX = 3083;
    teleportToY = 3504;

Thats for edge
Simply get your coords under player energy
or ::mypos

Save and close
Now adding objects

Open client.java

look for this public void
public void NewObjects() {

u’ll see stuff like

    makeGlobalObject(3075, 3503, 4705, -2, 10); // bank
    makeGlobalObject(3092, 3933, 6084, -1, 10); // bank

add another

    makeGlobalObject(3092, 3933, 6084, -1, 10); // bank

in this case

3092= coord X
3933= coords Y
6084=object id(u can see by right clicking Deposit Bank booth(8888,8888)=coord (9999)=object id
-1 = facing don’t toutch uhnless u know what it mean//how it work
10=simply DO NOT TOUCH

close and save

Adding npcs

autospawn.cfg with notepad
you’ll see

spawn = 2821 2508 3865 0 0 0 0 0 1 Zeke
npc id x y (dun toutch------------------------------)

simply add another1 edit save

Change death spawn

Client.java

look for public void youdied() {

ull ssee teleportToX = 2512;
teleportToY = 3863;

just edit em

look for

public boolean ApplyDead() {

in black font

ull see

        teleportToX = 3083;
        teleportToY = 3504;

edit it

look for } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“home”)) {

            teleportToX = 3083;
            teleportToY = 3504;

edit

now save

exit

compile and ur done

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change my home?

item.title: How do i change my home?
item.dc:creator: @ryan1322 ryan1322
item.description:
@ryan1322 wrote:

you can go into player.java and search for current home coords and replace with what u want. and to fix a home teleport just change the coords of the tele. =)
